about1: Hello, I am Bodhisatta Bhattacharjee currently in 7th Semester (as of
about2: ), pursuing my BTech in Computer Science from KIIT University, Bhubaneshwar, Odisha.
about3: I enjoy coding, problem solving and learning new technologies, and I'm looking for opportunities to grow as a software engineer and work on exciting and impactful projects. I aspire to be a Software / Game Developer. I had developed few games in UNITY earlier. I have exposure to Web Development with MERN and have made some projects (including this portfolio). I have hosted most of my projects on NETLIFY and VERCEL. I am also learning ML and AI and currently with a friend, I am working on a showcase website to host all our ML-AI models so anyone can test the models on our website. As our MAJOR project, my team and I are working on Computer Vision.

I like playing video games especially competitive FPS games (Counter Strike 2) or Full on WAR Games (like Battlefield V) and simulation games (like Cities Skylines, House Flipper). I also like to listen to calm, slow music mainly non vocal EDM, POP, JAZZ or in some rare ocassions HEAVY METAL. I get happy helping others. I like cute animals especially cats.
